channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Threat to Suspend Aid for Minnesota Child-Care Centers Rattles Families

item.title: Oil Tanker Fleeing the Coast Guard Now Listed in Russian Ship Database

item.title: Guides to help you tackle your New Year's resolutions
item.description: From building your strength to tackling credit card debt, NPR's Life Kit has a newsletter journey to help you tackle your New Year's resolution.

item.title: Rideshare union rights, social media limits and other state laws taking effect Jan. 1
item.description: Every new year, public media reporters across the country bring us some of the new state laws taking effect where they are. Here are six in 2026.

item.title: Mayor Mamdani Appoints a Team of Government Veterans
item.description: Zohran Mamdani has stocked his administration with seasoned officials, in part to allay concerns about his inexperience and left-wing stances.

item.title: Dozens presumed dead in fire at Swiss Alps bar during New Year's celebration

item.title: Crans-Montana is a Historic Swiss Ski Resort Popular with International Tourists
item.description: Known for its gourmet food, luxury stores, and for hosting major sporting events, the high-end resort was acquired by Vail Resorts in 2024.

item.title: Live Updates: Dozens Believed Dead After Fire at New Year’s Party in Switzerland, Police Say

item.title: Crans-Montana Bar Fire Victims Transported Across Switzerland for Treatment
item.description: Patients were taken by helicopter and jet to bigger, specialized hospitals in Geneva, Zurich and Lausanne.
